lyrics:
"Anytime You Ready" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Anytime You Ready" (feat. Birdman) [Gucci Mane:] Well, it take money to make money That's why I make money Need some today so I'm a go and take they money Play money, I weigh money Hundred grand, that's play money Counterfeit, that's fake money Lob city, that's Blake money Cash money, that Drake money Broke niggas, they hate money Rappers they get slave money Gucci Mane, I save money Gamble in your face money Brick squad we taste money Gold diggers they chase money Rich niggas! We waste money! Street smart, I know money Y'all niggas got no money Still making that slow money Hide cause you owe money Pimp niggas get ho money Scared money don't make money Like Big Meech, I blow money Y'all niggas is so funny [Hook:] It take money to make money Anytime you ready [x3] Wanna race nigga, wanna gamble? Anytime you ready [x3] Like to shop, and like to travel? Anytime you ready [x3] I could hit the club and go crazy Anytime you ready [x3] Got money I said it Bricksquad we ain't petty I'm so big headed, hundred eighty grand on my chevy Go broke, won't let it Swag sick can't help it Financial goals I met it It's a drumma track and it's epic Hood nigga with credit Bills, I don't sweat it Cash I go get it But these broke niggas pathetic Rich niggas go get it Bitch niggas get jealous Drop money, I'm careless It's all mine, I'm selfish Your money home, you left it? Broke nigga can't help it Ball hard, I'm wealthy Thank God I'm healthy From the jet way to the jet-ski Aren't you glad you met me? Haters say they don't like me But they gotta respect me! [Hook] [Birdman:] G nigga, about paper Them niggas getting the vapor We them niggas flipping that money And them other niggas be fakers High roller we shot call Real nigga we been balling Pussy nigga catch a sideline and Watching niggas who both balling Hustle nigga my own line Pussy niggas get flat-line Money nigga, get all the time New whip, for the sunshine Hustle with my balling nigga Cooking up them quarter, nigga Stepping up them order niggas Getting it out that water nigga Rich game, my rich gang nigga Feline and my wrist game nigga Weed niggas getting rich game We the niggas flipping the wrist game Key nigga, we move blood Get it from the G blood Uptown, we feed bloods Feed a nigga a dope plug [Hook] if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "I'm Up" (2012) Without Me I'm Up Trap Boomin' Cyeah Kansas Wish You Would Brought Out Them Racks Spread The Word Drink Mud Anytime You Ready Don't Make No Sense Super Cocky Gymnast Scarface Careless And Reckless Get Lost It Ain't Funny Plain Jane mixtape: "Gucci 3D By Gucci Mane" (2012) Intro (El Chapo) Rooster In My Rari Make It Look Easy Outta Control Drug Lord (Snippet) Diamonds Come Fuck With Me House Around The Corner Sway (Skit) Hood Rich Anthem MVP Shake Dat (Remix) Anytime You Ready Mouf I Don't Love Her 2 Girlz Knock 'Em Down Same Damn Time (Extended Remix) Search
